<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dire Wolf](/Monsters.aspx?ID=416)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Much larger and more foul-tempered than their common cousins, dire wolves haunt primeval lands that accommodate their massive size and proportionately large hunting grounds and appetites. Orcs are fond of using dire wolves as mounts, finding their vicious tempers perfect for hunting and warfare.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Dire Wolf](/Monsters.aspx?ID=416)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 334</row>

**Perception** +10; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 50

**Buck** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 piercing plus Knockdown or Grab

**Pack Attack**   The dire wolf's Strikes deal 1d6 extra damage to creatures within reach of at least two of the wolf's allies.

**Worry** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirements** The dire wolf has a creature grabbed with its jaws. **Effect** The dire wolf fiercely shakes the grabbed creature with its teeth, dealing 1d10+2 damage (DC 20 basic Fortitude save).

</column>
